de-DE.Select the sketch element for which you: Wählen Sie das Skizzenelement aus, für das Sie die Bezugsebene untersuchen möchten.
de-DE.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Suchen Sie die Ebene, in der die Skizze erstellt wurde.

en-US.Select the sketch element for which you: Select the sketch element for which you want to examine the reference plane.
en-US.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Find the plane at which the sketch was created.

es-ES.Select the sketch element for which you: Seleccione el elemento de croquis cuyo plano de referencia desea examinar.
es-ES.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Busque el plano en el que se creó el croquis.

fr-FR.Select the sketch element for which you: Sélectionnez l'élément d'esquisse dont vous souhaitez examiner le plan de référence.
fr-FR.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Recherchez le plan sur lequel l'esquisse a été créée.

it-IT.Select the sketch element for which you: Selezionare l'elemento dello schizzo per il quale si desidera esaminare il piano di riferimento.
it-IT.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Individuare il piano in cui è stato creato lo schizzo.

パラメトリックモードのみ利用可能です。
ja-JP.Select the sketch element for which you: 参照平面を調べるスケッチ要素を、選択して下さい。
ja-JP.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: スケッチ作成時の平面を探します。

ko-KR.Select the sketch element for which you: 참조 평면을 검사할 스케치 요소를 선택합니다.

只在参数化模式下可用。
zh-CN.Select the sketch element for which you: 选择你想检查参考平面的草图元素。

pl-PL.Select the sketch element for which you: Wybierz element szkicu, dla którego chcesz sprawdzić płaszczyznę odniesienia.
pl-PL.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Znajdź płaszczyznę, na której został utworzony szkic.

pt-BR.Select the sketch element for which you: Selecione o elemento de esboço para o qual você deseja examinar o plano de referência.
pt-BR.Find the plane at which the sketch was c: Localize o plano no qual o esboço foi criado.

tr-TR.Select the sketch element for which you: Referans düzlemini incelemek istediğiniz eskiz elemanını seçin.
